scripts.debug-chain: cd ~/geotiff.js && npm run build && cd ~/georaster && npm run babel && cd ~/georaster-layer-for-leaflet && npm run babel && cd ~/geotiff-io && npm run babel && npm run build && cd ~/geotiff.io && npm run start
scripts.build: npm install && react-scripts build && mv docs/CNAME . && rm -fr docs && cp -fr build docs && mv CNAME docs/.
